page.title: 03Where People Work.
page.content: There are not many places of employment in our block,so few people work here. The places of employment in our block are: B.Walker & Co. (Builders) Hairdresser. Owlpen Manor. Uley School. Most people live in Uley but work away. Out of thirty eight people surveyed,only six worked in our block. This is because most of the jobs here are taken or the place doesn't need people. Seeing that Uley is just a village and our block is rural it has quite a few places of employment.However,most of them are part_time so most people work somewhere else. Some common work places are Berkeley, Bristol and Dursley. Only one person worked in London. This is surprising as London is at least one and three quarter hours drive from here.
